name: Reincarnate

m.text: A humanoid-sized hay doll infused with rare oils worth 1,000+ GP, which the spell consumes.

entries: You touch a dead creature or a piece of one at least as large as a finger. If the creature has been dead no longer than 10 days, the spell transforms the humanoid-sized hay doll used as a component for this spell into a new body of the species the creator of the doll attempted to replicate, and calls the soul to inhabit that body. The target takes a 3 levels of {@condition Exhaustion}.
